content.raw:
Should be fixed now.

The reason that we need this fix is because the ConnectionTable exceptions are raised in a thread since: 

[https://bitbucket.org/labscript\_suite/labscript\_utils/commits/87a9c9395ea6](#!/labscript_suite/labscript_utils/commits/87a9c9395ea6)

This used to check that the shot file exists and now doesn’t. We can fix it the way I did or alternatively make the connection table raise exceptions in a thread only if specified by a keyword.
content.html:
Should be fixed now.

The reason that we need this fix is because the ConnectionTable exceptions are raised in a thread since:

#!/labscript_suite/labscript_utils/commits/87a9c9395ea6

This used to check that the shot file exists and now doesn’t. We can fix it the way I did or alternatively make the connection table raise exceptions in a thread only if specified by a keyword.
